incentives.description: 5% fee reduction tied to annual HIPAA security risk assessment completion

clauses.text: Business Associate shall implement administrative, physical, and technical safeguards consistent with 45 C.F.R. ยง164.308-312, including AES-256 encryption at rest and TLS 1.3 in transit.

playbook.fallback: Add quarterly penetration testing attestation and SOC 2 Type II mapping table.

clauses.text: Business Associate will notify Covered Entity within 24 hours of discovering an actual or suspected Breach of Unsecured PHI and provide a detailed incident report within 48 hours.

playbook.fallback: Include interim status updates every 12 hours until containment is confirmed.

clauses.text: Business Associate must execute written sub-BAA agreements with all subcontractors that create, receive, maintain, or transmit PHI on its behalf prior to data exchange.

playbook.fallback: Require annual subcontractor roster with security attestations and right-to-audit language.

risks.signal: Breach notice lacks real-time escalation pathway.
risks.recommendation: Add 24/7 incident hotline and escalation matrix.

risks.signal: No defined cadence for subcontractor disclosures.
risks.recommendation: Mandate quarterly subcontractor reporting and spot audits.
